item.title: IDAPython Plugin - Xref Counter
item.description: I created a small IDAPython which enumerates all of the xrefs in IDA within a given segment, counts the cross references, and then lists the address along with its xref count in a table. From there you can navigate to the actual address and export the data table to a csv file. I’ve found this to be a tremendous help in reverse engineering large executables (games) which use global variables. In the demo video below, I’m running the scan on Diablo 3 patch 2.3.

item.title: About
item.description: I’m an eternal student with interests in distributed computing, high performance computing, functional programming, low-level programming, and reverse engineering. In my spare time, I enjoy studying economics and finance. github: onethawt email: one.thawt [at] gmail.com twitter: one_thawt
